author: cms-L1TK
body:
#### PR description:

This PR has code developed over a long time that includes the removal of the iMath code, removal of the non-combined modules and new TB code that combines TB for multiple seeding combinations. Plus many other cleanups.

#### PR validation:

This code is running and producing tracks. Still have an issue where tracks in the forward region is not passed to the KF. Also need to check that test vectors are OK with HLS.
title: iMath removal + non-Combined removal + combined TB
